wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Gisborne Gordon, (15 December 1851 – 8 July 1935) was a rugby football player who played for North of Ireland F.C. and represented Ireland. He has the distinction of being the only one-handed/armed man ever to play international rugby (union or league).

response: * Thomas Gisborne Gordon (1851–1935), Ireland rugby player

link_mentions.page: List of Ireland national rugby union players

response: * Thomas Gisborne Gordon, the only one handed player in international rugby.
* Thomas Gisborne Gordon, one-armed Irish player.

link_mentions.page: List of Ireland national rugby union team records
response: *Thomas Gisborne Gordon, who played for Ireland between 1877–78, is the only one handed player to have competed in international rugby of either code.
